1.content:
Cave Woman
A tribe of cavemen are menaced by a Giantess. Can they convince her to take them on as her pets? And what will happen when an even bigger giantess shows up?

Athena vs Isis; Clash of Goddesses
A Goddess of War appears and demands her religion be spread by the sword. Can the neighboring Kingdom summon their own Goddess to aid them? And which Goddess will come out on top?

Frost Giantess
A frost Giantess is taking people as slaves, can an even bigger Giantess be recruited to stop her?

Fairy
A mischievous fairy is shrinking men and enlarging women. Can the fairy queen Titania be convinced to come to the kingdom's aid? And what will the punishment be for the mischievous fairy?

Genie
A spoiled Princess acquires a magic lamp and begins making wishes to improve her situation, but she accidentally shrinks all of the men in the kingdom! Can she rephrase her wish so no other disasters happen? Is anyone else trying to steal the lamp away from her?
1.title: Which Story?

choices: She Demands the Cavemen make her their Queen
She Demands the Cavemen worship her as a Goddess
11.content:
A peaceful village of hunter-gatherers lays nestled in a deep forest in the shadows of tall mountains. They wear animal skins and loincloths, when they wear anything at all. They live in stick and mud huts when they don't sleep under the stars. Their life is idyllic, war and hunger are unknown.

Then one day a Giantess emerges from the forest, her curvaceous figure barely covered by mammoth skins, red hair streaming down onto her sun-browned shoulders....
11.title: Cavewoman

choices: They decide to kill the Giantess
They decide to make the Giantess their leader
111.content:
The peaceful villagers panic and flee before the massive Giantess but she easily overtakes them with her enormous stride

Again and again her filthy bare feet come crashing down upon them reducing strong men to paste within seconds

Her soles come down on the huts of the people smashing weeks of work to splinters in an instant

Nothing can stand against her fury!

Woman and children are crushed! Buildings and pets are smashed! The men rally to defend their woman and children but they too are flattened beneath her irresistible weight.

Spears merely annoy her, sling-stones bounce harmlessly from her tan skin

As the village lies in smoking ruin she snatches up meat from the smokehouse and lumbers off into the forest, heading back towards the mountains where she no doubt makes her lair. Entire smoked stags seem to weight nothing in the grasp of her unstoppable fingers

The surviving villagers are devastated, everything they have built over so many seasons has been destroyed in a single afternoon

What can they do?
111.title: She Destroys the Village

choices: She comes to a lake to bathe
The rampaging has turned her on.
1111.content: Foolishly the villages decide they will attempt to kill the giantess. Already they had tried everything. They decided they needed to do the same thing again. Once more stones and spears were made upon her feet in a pitiful attempt to hurt her. It did not work. The giantess picked up a massive tree with her mighty hands and used it as a club smashing the puny warriors with her rage. She let out roars that made the earth shake to the horrors of the villages she was growing, the tree had transformed into a massive spiked club fitting for her. She lifted it and with all her might slammed it down cracking the worthless soil below and obliterating the village. The 200 meter tall giantess (606ft) let out a laugh as she continued her walk.
1111.title: They decide to kill the Giantess

choices: Dar calls out to the Giantess
Dar begins massaging the Giantess' feet
1112.content:
They decide that the Giantess is too powerful to fight, and the countryside is too rugged to flee through. Their only choice; submission!

If they can convince the Giantess to become their patron they would never need fear such an attack ever again! She could protect and shelter them, she could perhaps even help them to conquer other tribes

Their best surviving hunter, Dar, leads forth the men of the village, those who remain alive that is. The Giantess' trail is easy to follow; trees snapped like twigs, footprints the size of an ox, giant boulders carelessly kicked aside...

Soon they come to her cave, a massive yawning fissure of blackness wrent in the side of the mountain. A glimmer of firelight spills out from it's depths

Dar decides to go in alone, so as not to startle the powerful goddess

He finds her sitting on a pallet of mammoth skins beside a roaring bonfire. In the corner of the cave is a wicker cage holding human captives. She is gnawing upon the roasted corpse of a man and a slave rubs her massive, dirty feet with oil, cleaning and massaging her soles with all the power of his muscular frame...
1112.title: They decide to make the Giantess their leader

choices: She Shrinks all the Men of the City
She Demands the People worship Her
12.content:
A gleaming white-marble city lies on a hill. The people wear tunics and togas, they grow olives and herd sheep. All men are equal before their laws and peace reigns in an early form of democracy.

Then a towering Goddess appears in the heart of the city...
12.title: Goddesses

121.content:
Without warning she appears towering far above the acropolis. Golden sandals on her feet, golden hair flowing down over her shoulders, the most airy silk barely concealing her voluptuous figure

'First see my power!' she bellows raising one hand up over the city

The next instant her attack breaks upon the city like a tidal wave onto a sand-castle. Marble shatters at her strength, bronze bends against her skin

The buildings topple and are reduced to rubble as she kicks and smashes down the gleaming city

Panoply-clad hoplites rush forward with long spears only to see them glance impotently off of her divine skin. A moment later her golden sandals spell their doom. Crashing down into the midst of their phalanx with the force of a grindstone being cast upon an egg

Splattered blood and bent bronze is all that remains of the town guard

Women scream and run, animals bray in panic, children too are smashed under her the soles of her sandals! No one is spared rom the wrath of the Goddess!

Her voice breaks like thunder as he ends her assault

'Now that you see my power I command you all...'
121.title: She Destroys the City

choices: Her army to wait, she will destroy the city herself
Her army to attack, she will watch the battle
1211.content:
The towering blonde Goddess had spoken and the people of the city had no choice but to obey, obey or be crushed beneath her irresistible feet

Armor, shields, and spears were salvaged. Horses, chariots, and bows were prepared. All the while the Goddess lounged regally on the acropolis overlooking the city, casting it's streets into shadow far beneath her. It was as if a mountain had grown up there overnight, a new landmark on the cityscape. A mountain of bronzed curves, and golden locks, her imperial smirk terrifying all into greater haste in their preparations.

The king of the city was Demetrius and he became her liason. The general of her army and her voice among the people. She told the once-great king that the Goddess of the neighboring kingdom had angered her. That the people of Isis would soon suffer the wrath of Athena!

Days later the army marched. Athena's shadow casting them in perpetual shade, hundreds of men followed her to war, careful to avoid the thoughtless tread of her divine feet.

Soon an enemy city appeared on the horizon, crowned by a massive pyramid, nestled along the shores of a mighty river, but surrounded by scrub on all sides

The Goddess orders...
1211.title: Prepare for War!

choices: She captures the men in the caravan
She kills the men of the caravan
She demands the caravan hand over it's goods
She demands the men of the caravan become her slaves
13.content:
A range of high snow-capped mountains lies between two kingdoms. Only one pass allows trade between the two friendly states and caravans often pass back and forth without fear of bandits or monsters.

One day a caravan is passing along the pass, snow gleams above them, but there seems no risk of avalanche. Then the caravan rounds a corner of the mountain and a blue-skinned frost Giantess comes into view...
13.title: Frost Giantess

choices: A hero decides to seek help against the Giantess
A hero decides to attack the Giantess
The Giantess begins to march on the Kingdom
131.content:
Without warning the blonde Giantess charges forward like some titan bull, head lowered and hands bared

The vanguards and their horses are snatched up in her massive hands and dashed upon the rocks. Next comes the first wagon, pressed over her head as if it were a toy and then smitten to ruin upon the mountainside

A rain of arrows deflects harmlessly from her icy skin, a few being caught in the scanty scale armor covering her breasts and hips. The remaining guards rush forward cleaving her ankles with dane-axes but her skin is impenetrable to their puny strength

She kicks one man in the chest and he goes flying down into the chasm between mountains, the other man is crushed beneath her bare-foot his gurgling deathcry echoing over the mountains for miles

The rest of the slaughter is equally one-sided

No one can resist her strength No weapon can penetrate her skin! Her wrath is as cold and inevitable as an avalanche! Brave men are crushed in her arms like helpless children, and those who choose to flee are run down and stomped to death beneath her merciless soles

As silence returns to the pass she begins to turn towards what booty can be salvaged from the wreckage...
131.title: She destroys the caravan

1311.content:
Far away in the capitol word of the massacre has reached the King. And other massacres like it. This Giantess, Skadi they call her, is a menace. Her hunger for man-flesh is insatiable, her greed for stolen booty irrepressible

The King's greatest knight, Ser Dagonet, is called forward and entreated to do something. He may someday be called Giantslayer if only he can stop this she-devil, this walking avalanche, from claiming more victims.

Ser Dagonet is tall and powerful, his armor is heavy and his sword sharp, but he knows he is no match for this Giantess. She would finish him with one stomp, grinding his maille beneath her bare foot and splattering his guts across the snow as if he were an over-ripe grape.

He will not fight her directly. He will seek out another Giantess. A friendly Giantess to act as the King's champion. The ing agrees to this plan, and promises to set aside honors, gold, and land for this Giantess saviour.

Ready with the promise of booty, and glory, and worship to lure HER Ser Dagonet sets out in search of a Giantess...
1311.title: A hero decides to seek help against the Giantess

choices: She shrinks the men in the caravan
She enlarges the women in the caravan
She shrinks everyone in the caravan
14.content:
Between two kingdoms lies a deep dark forest where magic still lives. Trees and vines have grown here since the beginning of the world and still remember how to speak and move. The Fairies are the guardians of this forest and men are carefully not to cut down too many trees, or hunt down too many stags for fear of their wrath.

A caravan is traversing the Old forest Road, trees tower above them on either side blocking out the light of the sun. Out of the forest flies a glowing green fairy...
14.title: Mischevous Fairy

choices: The men TRY to take charge
143.content:
The green fairy buzzes through the caravan leaving a trail of glittering fairy dust behind her and wherever the dust falls strange changes begin to take hold

As the dust settles on the women of the caravan they begin the breath heavily, their clothes seem to constrict, their bones seem to ache

Then all at once they begin to grow!

Blouses rip, corsets burst, skirts are torn to ribbons as the women expand and enlarge. Blondes, brunettes, and redheads shoot towards the sky their breasts swelling and their legs stretching out beneath them like tree-trunks

Some of the wagons cannot bear the weight and collapse, some of the women reel, dizzy with the change, and accidentally trod upon their men-folk, who only moments before had stood masterful and commanding against these gentle dames and maidens

The fairy giggles as the scene comes to rest; a dozen giantesses standing amidst crushed wagons and panicked men. Gawking in wonder at what has happened to them

The fairy darts off into the depths of the forest and then...
143.title: She enlarges the women in the caravan

choices: I Wish Women Were SUPERIOR to Men!
I Wish Men Were INFERIOR to Women!
I Wish for power over my father the Sultan!
15.content:
Between a vast sandy desert and the sea lies a small but prosperous kingdom with a deep harbor and canny merchants. The Sultan rules over this small kingdom and has promised his daughter's hand to a fair prince across the ocean

But the Princess wishes to someday choose her own husband and chafes at the restrictions placed upon her sex

She has sent her most trusted assassin deep into the desert to recover a fabled magical lamp from a near-mythical lost city

Today he has returned to her with the precious treasure

The Princess rubs the lamp and a beautiful blue-skinned genie slowly flows out like a vaporous cloud

'I will grant you 3 wishes oh mistress!' says the genie bowing deeply to the mortal princess

The Princess wishes...
15.title: Genie

info.description: A collection of GTS stories set in various fantasy worlds
